issue.title: C++: Add option so that resize doesn't decrease the capacity
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-469](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-469). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The code I wrote in `parquet_arrow` was heavily relying on this fact. As in that case we are ok with having a lot of wastage (as we resize in both directions very often), we should provide the user with a choice.

I would by default shrink down on a smaller size as this is the thing a user probably expects.
